indications.text: cystaran® cystine-depleting agent indicated treatment corneal cystine crystal accumulation patients cystinosis .

contraindications.text: instill one drop cystaran eye , every waking hour . touch dropper tip surface , may contaminate solution . discard 1 week .

warningsAndPrecautions: fifteen ( 15 ) ml cystaran ( cysteamine ophthalmic solution ) 0.44 % supplied opaque , white , low-density polyethylene ( ldpe ) 88 mm tall bottle 1.6 mm blue , silicone rubber flow-controlled dropper tip closed white , high-density polyethylene ( hdpe ) screw cap . bottle foil-wrapped stored carton .
name: CYSTARAN
indications_original: CYSTARAN® is a cystine-depleting agent indicated for the treatment of corneal cystine crystal accumulation in patients with cystinosis.
contraindications_original:
Instill one drop of CYSTARAN in each eye, every waking hour.
                  Do not touch dropper tip to any surface, as this may contaminate the solution.
                  Discard after 1 week of use.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: Fifteen (15) mL of CYSTARAN (cysteamine ophthalmic solution) 0.44% is supplied in an opaque, white, low-density polyethylene (LDPE) 88 mm tall bottle with a 1.6 mm blue, silicone rubber flow-controlled dropper tip and closed with a white, high-density polyethylene (HDPE) screw cap. The bottle is foil-wrapped and stored in a carton.
